automatizacion_hero_subtitle:
Electronic modernization of productive processes
without replacing machinery
automatizacion_description_1:
CADIPEL develops custom industrial automation solutions
to modernize productive processes and adapt existing machinery to new requirements. We integrate control electronics, sensing, operation interfaces and data capture to achieve higher performance, repeatability and traceability in plant.
automatizacion_problem_1: Obsolete electronics or without spare parts / without support
automatizacion_problem_2: Slow, manual processes or with high operational variability
automatizacion_problem_3: High costs of incorporating new or imported machinery
automatizacion_problem_4: Lack of measurement (times, scrap, stops, counts)
automatizacion_problem_5: Difficulty integrating sensors, actuators and information into a single system
automatizacion_benefits_item_1:
Productivity increase
(less downtime and more stable cycles)
automatizacion_benefits_item_3:
Repeatability and quality
(controlled parameters and recipes)
automatizacion_benefits_item_4:
Real-time control
(alarms, metrics and production visibility)
automatizacion_benefits_item_5:
Scalability: from a specific machine
to a complete line
automatizacion_technologies_item_1:
Industrial sensors and actuators
(motors, valves, resistors, etc.)
automatizacion_technologies_item_4:
Industrial communications and integration
with existing systems
automatizacion_cta_item_1: Electronic and electromechanical engineering applied to plant
automatizacion_cta_item_4: Integration with management / production systems when required
footer_description:
We listen to your needs
and design a custom solution
